revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = Dummy Strife item | class = DummyStrifeItem | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→DummyStrifeItem
 →[[Classes:AmmoFillup|AmmoFillup]]
 →[[Classes:CloseDoor222|CloseDoor222]]
 →[[Classes:HealthFillup|HealthFillup]]
 →[[Classes:OpenDoor222|OpenDoor222]]
 →[[Classes:OpenDoor224|OpenDoor224]]
 →[[Classes:RaiseAlarm|RaiseAlarm]]
 →[[Classes:SlideshowStarter|SlideshowStarter]]
 →[[Classes:UpgradeAccuracy|UpgradeAccuracy]]
 →[[Classes:UpgradeStamina|UpgradeStamina]]
These items are just used by Strife to perform scripted actions and cannot be held. They probably wouldn't exist if Strife had been made with the Hexen engine, as ACS would have been used instead. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR DummyStrifeItem : [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]] native { States { Spawn: TOKN A -1 Stop } }
